title: 3dTORTOISEtoHere
description: Convert standard TORTOISE DTs (diagonal-first format) to standard AFNI (lower triangular, row-wise) format.

dt_tort.title: DT file
dt_tort.description: Diffusion tensor file with six bricks of DT components ordered in the TORTOISE manner (Dxx, Dyy, Dzz, Dxy, Dxz, Dyz).

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Output file name prefix. Will have N+1 bricks when GRADFILE has N rows of gradients.

scale_factor.title: Scale factor
scale_factor.description: Optional switch to rescale the DT elements, dividing by a number X>0.

flip_x.title: Flip X
flip_x.description: Change sign of the first element of (inner) eigenvectors.

flip_y.title: Flip Y
flip_y.description: Change sign of the second element of (inner) eigenvectors.

flip_z.title: Flip Z
flip_z.description: Change sign of the third element of (inner) eigenvectors.
